casebody.data:
Alexander S. FISCH, Bankrupt-Appellant, v. Elliot L. KRAUSE, Trustee in Bankruptcy, Appellee. No. 100, Docket 25713. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 4, 1959. Decided Dec. 21, 1959. Alexander S. Fisch appeals from an order sustaining an order of a referee in bankruptcy denying him a discharge in bankruptcy because of a material false statement he had made in a written application for a bank loan. Herman G. Robbins, Brooklyn, N. Y. (Theodore Blatt, New York City, on the brief), for appellant. Elliot L. Krause, New York City, appellee pro se.

Before CLARK, WATERMAN and MOORE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Zavatt, 180 F.Supp. 45.
